title.en: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Jan

altTitles.en: ひぐらしの哭く頃に雀

description.en:
This chapter of the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni series, called the "Mahjong" chapter, is related to a "dramatic mahjong" game being released for the PSP in November 2009. This time, Keiichi (a boy who moved to the small village of Hinamizawa), finds himself drawn into a special mahjong course at his school.

The story of Higurashi no Naku Koro ni is divided into a total of eight chapters: four "Question" arcs and four "Answer" arcs. Each chapter keeps the same main characters, but ends in a different way. However, each chapter gives valuable answers, hints, and clues to the previous one, while at the same time bringing forth even more mysteries.

The question arcs are:

[*]1. [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/8975]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Onikakushi-hen
[*]2. [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2523]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Watanagashi-hen
[*]3. [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2524]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Tatarigoroshi-hen
[*]4. [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2525]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Himatsubushi-hen[/url]

The answer arcs are:

[*]5. [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2539]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kai - Meakashi-hen
[*]6. [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2540]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kai - Tsumihoroboshi-hen
[*]7. [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2582]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kai - Minagoroshi-hen
[*]8. [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2602]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kai - Matsuribayashi-hen[/url]

The side story arcs are:

[*][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2607]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Onisarashi-hen
[*][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2622]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Yoigoshi-hen
[*][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2616]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kai - Utsutsukowashi-hen
[*][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2771]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Hirukowashi-hen
[*][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/19298]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Kokoroiyashi-hen
[*][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2773]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Kataribanashi-hen
[*][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/23402]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei - Saikoroshi-hen
[*][url=https://mangadex.org/manga/2772]Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Jan
